info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 9:37PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Lewis and Clark and western Teton Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 936 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Augusta, or 21 miles southwest of Choteau, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bynum. This includes Highway 89 between mile markers 46 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. When thunder roars, go indoors.
